review: This Roku gives reliable connections and clear menus for the 2 streams I use, Netflix and Amazon Prime. . .I don't bother with anything else.  The stick stays on my wireless network without any problems.  Once in a blue moon it locks up and needs to be power cycled.  I like the remote, especially that it uses radio rather than IR; I wish it had the audio-output-jack feature.The only problem I had with this Roku was in setting it up because my network used Static IP addresses, which my streaming BlueRay player could accomodate, but this stick requires Dynamic IP address assignment.  So I had to change my whole IP address assignment philosophy to keep this thing happy.  Also, Roku support wasn't very effective for anything but the simplest issues.Though I like this Roku so far (about 6 months), if I got another streaming stick I would try the one from Amazon.
author: Virgin User
